description:
Wishing for sunny weather so he can go out and sketch for his homework, Takeru makes a teru teru bozu. Being told that since he`s in this situation, he should draw what`s here, Squid Girl says she will help. After taking the pen for herself, everyone is shocked at the outcome of the image she drew!
Sanae attempting to embrace Squid Girl and harshly getting smacked away has become a daily sight.  Eiko worries about this unhealthy behavior in Sanae and urges her to abstain from Squid Girl. She inspires Sanae by telling her it will get Squid Girl to like her, but it`s self-torment beyond her imagination.
The pitcher for Kiyomi`s baseball team falls ill just before a practice game.  Squid Girl says she will play as a substitute on short notice, but not knowing the rules, she makes defensive errors immediately. Moved by Kiyomi`s kind words and encouragement after her errors, Squid Girl demonstrates the power of a squid!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Est-ce un teru teru bôzu ? / Serai-je aimée ? / Si on jouait au baseball ?
Isn`t That a Teru Teru Bosquid? / What Squidsn`t There to Like? / One! Two! Three Squids, You`re Out!
Ist das nicht Teru Teru Bouzu? / Bist du ungeliebt? / Spielst du kein Baseball?
Teru Teru Bouzu ja Naika? / Sukarenaika? / Yakyuu Shinaika?
てるてる坊主じゃなイカ? / 好かれなイカ? / 野球しなイカ?
